#kuloodporny #tod6 #tmfd7 #tmfd14 #t34 #kv1 #realistic #semirealistic

TOD-6, TMFD-7 and TMFD-14 sights for T-34-57, T-34-76 and KV-1 with Russian captions

Compatible with 2.3.0.85

Details of the sight are loosely based on various pictures of optics that I found on Internet
I based TMFD-14 on TMFD-7 due to lack of sources.

OUTDATED! New version -> https://live.warthunder.com/post/943449

Semi-historical sight grid Turmzielfernrohr 38(t) Bild 4 and Bild 5 for Panzerkampfwagen 38(t).

New
Added Bild 5.

Scales
Because I because of the nature of war, the thunder failed to construct a historical grid, I made as close as possible. Scales: for PzGr. 40 left and for Pzgr. 34(t) and Pzgr.(t) umg. right.

Also suggest to read the article Calculation of the distance (ru) -> https://wiki.warthunder.ru/Вычисление_дистанции

Note: (Bild 4) the price of dividing the horizontal scale is ...

Made a little custom sights for all of you guys that like to play the (freshly obtained) Object 120 for both APFSDS and HEATFS. It's more meant as a joke, but you really can play with them after a while.

Work in Progress: Type 75 MLRS

#wip #type75_mlrs #type75 #75 #mlrs #fictional

Just a little WIP-sight for the new Japanese Type 75 MLRS rocket launcher.

If you want you can try it out - and of course I'll be grateful for your feedback so I can finalize the whole thing!

= )

#kuloodporny #t54 #t55 #t55a #t55am #t55am1 #tsh2b #tsh2b32 #tsh2b32p #realistic #semirealistic

TSh-2B-32 and TSh-2B-32P telescopic sight for T-54, T-55A and T-55AM-1 with Polish and Russian captions

Compatible with 1.83.0.111

Notes:
- Details of the sight are loosely based on various photos of optics that I found on Internet.
- Polish captions based on description of TSz-2B-32P sight found in "Czołg T-55AM i pochodne (T-55AD-1M, T-55AD-2M, T-55AMS)", Gaj Krzysztof, 2013

Captions:
- OF-PEŁNY: HEF-FULL propellant
- BR-412D: APHE
- BK: HEAT
- GCz-C: coaxial machinegun RiGCz
- PODK: SUBCalib

Fire-control system for L7 (L7A1 / L7A3 / M68 / OTO Melara)

Version 2.1 (12/31/2018)
• Fixed the name of some folders
• Fixed sight for Abrams

Schindibee's fictional "SPHYRNA" Sight for BMP-1

#customsight #sight #fictional #bmp1 #bmp_1 #sphyrna

This is a fully fictional sight for the Russian BMP-1 IFV / scout tank, including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Ranging scale for HEAT ammo, with included deflection aiming help
(for flanked targets moving at 20 km/h, end of lines for 40 km/h...)

- Ranging funnel for HEAT ammo (configured for tank lengths of 7m, width of 3.5m, allows pretty good
accuracy for targets angled 90° to 30°)

- Ranging scale for HE ammo and coaxial MG (right scales)

- Stadiametric rangefinder fo

#leopard2a4 #DM13 #DM23 #2a4 #leopard

personal experiment

i'm still learning how to make a custom collimator / targeting sight for aircraft.

big thanks for this post
https://live.warthunder.com/post/714495/en/

#sight

Минималистичный прицел для игры в аркаду
Подходит для любых танков, но если на каком-то танке смотрится не очень можно поиграться с параметрами
fontSizeMult:r=0.7
lineSizeMult:r=1.2
Для пушек с большой скоростью снаряда можно уменьшить fontSizeMult в меньшую сторону, т.к. расстояние
между рисками там уменьшается и для лучшей читаемости можно уменьшить и шрифт. lineSizeMult отвечает за толщину линий.

Minimalistic crosshair for arcade battles
Decreasing fontSizeMult parameter for high velocity guns might help for better reading. lineSizeMult changes the thickness of the lines.

#arcade #ab #s

More or less correct reticles for BPK-2-42 gunner`s sight of BMP-2.

Package includes 2 versions:
- Reticle completed with all etched and projected elements. Note- currently it is not possible to script colors of geometric elements, so everything is rendered in black. And one more thing- stadiametric scale not fitting FOV is perfectly normal, just forget those pics from manuals :)
- Emergency etched reticle only, the only thing visible if power is down or bulb of collimator is dead.

Known issue: HEI scale is not fully rendered because of software limitations

#BMP2 #usersight #gunsight #reali

Assembling my sights, which i use with rangefinders for RB and SB

Fictional Tank sight package for Russian 76mm F-34, F-96, ZiS-3, ZiS-5 and 1902/30 armed tanks

VERSION 2: CORRECTED ISSUES INTRODUCED WITH CHANGED MUZZLE VELOCITY OF RECENT PATCH

#sight #gunsight #kv1s #kv1_zis5 #t34_1942 #t34e #t34e_stz #t34_747 #su76 #su_5_1 #matilda_mk2_f96 #fictional #funnel

This is a collection of fictional sights for all 76mm F-34, F-96, ZiS-3, ZiS-5 and 1902/30 armed tanks in War Thunder:


  • T-34E
  • T-34E STZ
  • T-34 1941 1st Gv.T.Br.
  • T-34-747(r)
  • KV-1S
  • KV-1 ZiS-5
  • Matilda IIA F-96
  • Su-5-1
  • Su-76M
  • Su-76M 5th Gv.Kav.Corp.

#type_62
A sight for the type_62 only.

Imperialism And All Reactionaries Are Paper Tigers!（帝国主义和一切反动派都是纸老虎）
All reactionaries are paper tigers. In appearance, the reactionaries are terrifying, but in reality, they are not so powerful. From a long-term point of view, it is not the reactionaries but the people who are powerful.
——Mao Tse Tung."Talk with the American Correspondent Anna Louise Strong" (August 1946), Selected Works, Vol. IV, p. 100.

People All Over The World, Unite!（全世界人民，团结起来！）
People of the World, Unite and Defeat the U.S. Aggressors and All Their Running Dogs
——Mao Tse Tung.

#t55am

Realistic BMP-2 sights, includes both early (BPK-1-42), and later (BPK-2-42) sights. Sadly HE scale has an issue of only showing scale up to 2.4km, so I cut it off at 2.2km.

Update 1

Figured out APDS settings, added a BPK-2-42 version with left scale for APDS, and a non-realistic version of the BPK-2-42 that has range scales for both AP-T and APDS (on the left range scale, left side is APDS, right side is AP-T).

Also lowered HE-I scale to 2.2km since it got cut off at 2.4km anyway, and configured it correctly for HE belt (muzzle velocity 10m/s slower than AP-T, virtually indistinguishable a

Schindibee's fictional "SPHYRNA" Sight for Begleitpanzer 57

#customsight #sight #fictional #begleitpanzer_57 #bagel #sphyrna

This is a fully fictional sight German Begleitpanzer 57 scout tank, including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Ranging scale for armor-piercing ammo, with included deflection aiming help
(for flanked targets moving at 20 km/h, end of lines for 40 km/h...)

- Ranging funnel for armor-piercing ammoammo (configured for tank lengths of 7m, width of 3.5m, allows pretty good
accuracy for targets angled 90° to 30°)

- Ranging scale for HE ammo (right scale)

-

#gepard #flakpanzer_gepard #type87 #type_87

Zip contains both a static semi-realistic sight based on YT footage in the screenshots. Semi- realistic because IRL the fire control system adjust the visual circle. (which is not possible in WT AFAIK) ZIP and files contain a more noticeable name as per request.

To make it more game friendly I have added a fictional version of the static sight with an additional lead ring.

Both sights have a vertical offset of the cursor so that the sight can be better used in SIM optics, which you should use if you want to use 1st person sights for SPAA anyways.

Schindibee's fictional "SPHYRNA" Sight for Leopard 2K

#customsight #sight #fictional #leopard_2k #keiler #sphyrna

This is a fully fictional sight German Leopard 2K "Keiler" tank, including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Ranging scale for APFSDS ammo, with included deflection aiming help
(for flanked targets moving at 20 km/h, end of lines for 40 km/h...)

- Ranging funnel for APFSDS ammo (configured for tank lengths of 7m, width of 3.5m, allows pretty good
accuracy for targets angled 90° to 30°)

- Ranging scale for HEAT-FS ammo (right scale)

- Stadiametric rangefinder for
